column6: p.r.; P.b.k. at 250 nm in N$_2$O-satd. soln. contg. various concn. of Mn(ClO$_4$)$_2$; product suggested by condy. results at pH 9 is Mn(OH)$_2^{+}$; at pH 3 the same buildup kinetics but no condy. change were obtained suggesting the product MnOH$^{2+}$, $pK_a = 5.0$.

column5: C.k. in soln. contg. EtOH, CCl$_4$ and 0.1-0.3 mol L$^{-1}$ Mn$^{2+}$; obs. Mn$^{III}$ at 255 nm (cor. for $\ce{.CCl_3}$); rel. to $k($OH + EtOH$)$.

column6: p.r.; P.b.k. at 258 nm (Mn$^{III}$) $\epsilon = 2100$ L mol$^{-1}$ cm$^{-1}$.
